createRoom.title: Create a Room
createRoom.description: This API allows you to create a room with a unique roomId.

postParameters.deprecatedMessage:
The region parameter has been discontinued; instead, the Video SDK's smart service will pick the best optimal servers for a conference, closest to your end-users' location.

If you still need to hold your conferences in a specific region, i.e. Geo Fencing, [Contact Us](https://videosdk.live/contact)

postParameters.description: #### A custom ID used to identify a room other than the `roomId`. This value must be unique for each room.

#### You can subscribe to various types of events to receive a webhook when one or more specified events occur in the room:
 - `participant-joined` 
 - `participant-left` 
 - `session-started` 
 - `session-ended` 
 - `recording-started` 
 - `recording-stopped` 
 - `livestream-started` 
 - `livestream-stopped` 
 - `hls-started` 
 - `hls-stopped` 

Please refer the [User Webhooks](/api-reference/realtime-communication/user-webhooks) page for more information regarding event webhooks.
